Package edu.isi.powerloom.gui.common

Classes and interfaces used throughout the entire application, such as utility classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Preferences This class provides facilities for loading and saving application preferences to and from a property file.
StringUtils Utility class for doing String manipulation.
 

Exception Summary
AppException This is the top-level application exception.
ClientException This represents application exceptions that occur on the client side (that is, within the GUI).
 

Package edu.isi.powerloom.gui.common Description

Classes and interfaces used throughout the entire application, such as utility classes.

Questions and comments should be directed to Eric Melz or Hans Chalupsky
